description: This header file declares utility functions for ASN.1 component objects in a BroadWay Service Delivery System, including attribute list manipulations and time/string utilities.

methods.name: GetSingleLinkEntryByIndex
methods.description: Retrieves a single link entry from a linked list by index.

methods.name: AttrListRemoveAllAttributes
methods.description: Removes all attributes from an attribute list.

methods.name: AttrListCopyAllAttributes
methods.description: Copies all attributes from a source attribute list to a destination list.

methods.name: AttrListCompareAttributeList
methods.description: Compares two attribute lists for equality.

methods.name: AttrListGetSizeOfEncoded
methods.description: Calculates the size of encoded attribute list data.

methods.name: AttrListEncodingData
methods.description: Encodes attribute list data into a buffer.

methods.name: AttrListDecodingData
methods.description: Decodes attribute list data from a buffer.

methods.name: AttrListDump
methods.description: Outputs the attribute list data into a buffer, returning success status.

methods.name: AnscIsReadableString
methods.description: Checks if a string of given length is readable.
